name: DST App Received
description: Post this whenever a DST Application is received
baseContent:
[center][b][size=150]OFFICE OF THE SHERIFF[/size][/b][/center]



[center][aligntable=left,200,0,0,0,0,transparent]
[indent][b]JONATHAN MEDINA[/b]
LOS SANTOS COUNTY SHERIFF[/indent][/aligntable]
[aligntable=right,200,0,0,0,0,transparent]
[b][indent]HALL OF JUSTICE[/b]
301 INNOCENCE BOULEVARD[indent][/aligntable]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/LEWTXbL.png[/img][hr][/hr][/center]

[indent]{{date:field_1761991834111}}

Dear {{text:field_1761991840132}},

We have received your application and qualifications for the position of [b]Deputy Sheriff Trainee[/b]. Thank you for showing interest in employment with the Los Santos County Sheriff's Department.

Your request has been acknowledged and forwarded to the Pre-Employment Unit for further deliberation & conclusion. This deliberation will include a thorough examination of your previous service with the Department and personal background information.

While extraneous circumstances may preclude a fixed timeframe, you should expect a response to your request within 72 hours.

Sincerely,
[imgmw=100]https://i.imgur.com/F1HzZkv.png[/imgmw]
Jonathan Medina, Sheriff
[imgmw=125]https://i.imgur.com/OZCXf9r.png[/imgmw]
Lisa Chan, Unit Commander
Training Bureau[/indent]
[br][/br]
[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/vggSUzN.png[/img][/center]
author: ASD Panel
